Control Name: Creates and Maintains Records of System Output Activities—Records of system output activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.

control_attributes.Control: Creates and Maintains Records of System Output Activities—Records of system output activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
control_attributes.SubCategory: PI1.4 The entity implements policies and procedures to make available or deliver output completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with specifications to meet the entity’s objectives.
